title: 14: No Such Thing As A Dirty Pair Of Jeans
content: This week in the QI Office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm), Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) & Freddy Soames (@fsoames) discuss Charlemagne's tablecloth, Charles Lindbergh's fan mail, the original members of the Mile-High club and more...
